TopicTitle: How the heck do I export and import models?

Articles.Content: I was planning on importing a model to take a look at it, but then I noticed that there is no import option for mu files and that made me wonder, How the heck do I import and export models into Blender?

.mu is the exported file format from unity. You import your model from your modeling software as obj fbx or what ever you like into unity. Then from unity you export your model to .mu and then the game can load it.

Read this.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25013-Compilation-of-modding-information-links-for-0-19-0-20-Last-updated-28th-July
